Highly recommended for both comfort and durability!

The material is also too thick, I wanted it to be on the thinner side so that I could wear it in the summer, but it is good for fall and layering. Also, the material is not too good, I just know in a few wears it is going to create pills and get all fuzzy, but I expected it. So if I were you, I would buy another shirt, preferably made of cotton and save some money.
